alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 5:24PM CDT until June 27 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bastrop to 7 miles northwest of Claiborne, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Sterlington, Drew, Fondale, Fairbanks, Perryville, Bosco, Loch Lomon, Riverton, Millhaven, Cheniere, Rocky Branch, Pine Grove and Luna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
